text: 1.5 Lom 13.8-10, Gal 5.14, 2 Ti 2.22 Pen takaw kɨles agebin ak jɨj ne ak anɨgɨl mɨdeb, Klays binɨb ne kɨli penpen mapen yɨbɨl lɨnɨgel. Kɨli ke nɨgtep yɨbɨl gɨl gos pal ak teplep won ak nɨg mɨdɨl, chɨbol nab kɨli ayaŋ mɨdtep gɨl, Klays nop nokom gos lɨnɨŋɨd genɨgel ak nɨm, penpen mapen yɨbɨl lɨnɨgabal.
